description.value: When character uses Charm or Intimidate to affect multiple people, they can affect up to 100x their Fellowship Bonus. They add +10 Loyalty to their Minions. When in a Social Conflict against one or more opponent (including crowds), character saps 1d10 Willpower instead of 1d5 if using Charm or Intimidate Opposed Tests.
